pullrequest.title: Issue#124 missing base to thruster tf

content.raw:
I also tested with

`roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch thrust_config:=X`

and

`roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch thrust_config:=H`

which seem to work as expected.  Also makes RVIZ behave…

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/1413047365-image.png)
Looks good to me.
content.html:
I also tested with

roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch thrust_config:=X

and

roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch thrust_config:=H

which seem to work as expected. Also makes RVIZ behave…

Looks good to me.
